definition: the standard number of strokes set for each hole on a golf course, or for the entire course, make a score (on a hole) equal to par
details:
noun
- the standard number of strokes set for each hole on a golf course, or for the entire course
= example: the standard number of strokes set for each hole on a golf course, or for the entire course
- a state of being essentially equal or equivalent
= synonyms: equation
verb
- make a score (on a hole) equal to par
